00025 Topology::~Topology()
00026 {
00027     Cleanup();
00028     if(_bc)
00029         delete (_bc);
00030     _bc = NULL;
00031 }
00032 
00033 void Topology::Cleanup()
00034 {
00035     // cleanup beads
00036     {
00037         BeadContainer::iterator i;
00038         for(i=_beads.begin();i<_beads.end();++i)
00039             delete *i;
00040         _beads.clear();
00041     }
00042     // cleanup molecules
00043     {
00044         MoleculeContainer::iterator i;
00045         for(i=_molecules.begin();i<_molecules.end();++i)
00046             delete *i;
00047         _molecules.clear();
00048     }
00049     // cleanup residues
00050     {
00051         ResidueContainer::iterator i;
00052         for(i=_residues.begin();i<_residues.end();++i)
00053             delete (*i);
00054         _residues.clear();
00055     }
00056     // cleanup interactions
00057     {
00058         InteractionContainer::iterator i;
00059         for(i=_interactions.begin();i<_interactions.end();++i)
00060             delete (*i);
00061         _interactions.clear();
00062     }
00063     // cleanup _bc object
00064     if(_bc)
00065         delete (_bc);
00066     _bc = new OpenBox();
00067 }
00068 
00070 void Topology::CreateMoleculesByRange(string name, int first, int nbeads, int nmolecules)
00071 {
00072     Molecule *mol = CreateMolecule(name);
00073     int beadcount=0;
00074    
00075     BeadContainer::iterator bead;    
00076     for(bead=_beads.begin(); bead!=_beads.end(); ++bead) {
00077         while(--first > 0) continue;
00078         string bname = //lexical_cast<string>(mol->getId()) + ":" 
00079                       //lexical_cast<string>(bead->Residue()) + ":" 
00080                       //+
00081                       (*bead)->getName();
00082         mol->AddBead((*bead), bname);
00083         if(++beadcount == nbeads) {
00084             if(--nmolecules <= 0) break;
00085             mol = CreateMolecule(name);            
00086             beadcount = 0;
00087         }
00088     }
00089 }
00090 
00092 void Topology::CreateMoleculesByResidue()
00093 {
00094     // first create a molecule for each residue    
00095     ResidueContainer::iterator res;    
00096     for(res=_residues.begin(); res!=_residues.end(); ++res) {
00097         CreateMolecule((*res)->getName());
00098     }
00099     
00100     // add the beads to the corresponding molecules based on their resid
00101     BeadContainer::iterator bead;    
00102     for(bead=_beads.begin(); bead!=_beads.end(); ++bead) {
00103         //MoleculeByIndex((*bead)->getResnr())->AddBead((*bead)->getId(), (*bead)->getName());
00104 
00105         MoleculeByIndex((*bead)->getResnr())->AddBead((*bead), string("1:TRI:") + (*bead)->getName());
00106     }
00107     
00109 }
00110 
00111 void Topology::CreateOneBigMolecule(string name)
00112 {
00113     Molecule *mi = CreateMolecule(name);
00114     
00115     BeadContainer::iterator bead;    
00116     
00117     for(bead=_beads.begin(); bead!=_beads.end(); ++bead) {
00118         stringstream n("");
00119         n << (*bead)->getResnr() +1 << ":" <<  _residues[(*bead)->getResnr()]->getName() << ":" << (*bead)->getName();
00120         //cout << n.str() << endl;
00121         mi->AddBead((*bead), n.str());
00122     }    
00123 }
00124 
00125 void Topology::Add(Topology *top)
00126 {
00127     BeadContainer::iterator bead;
00128     ResidueContainer::iterator res;
00129     MoleculeContainer::iterator mol;
00130     
00131     int res0=ResidueCount();
00132     
00133     for(bead=top->_beads.begin(); bead!=top->_beads.end(); ++bead) {
00134         Bead *bi = *bead;
00135         BeadType *type =  GetOrCreateBeadType(bi->getType()->getName());
00136         CreateBead(bi->getSymmetry(), bi->getName(), type, bi->getResnr()+res0, bi->getM(), bi->getQ());
00137     }
00138     
00139     for(res=top->_residues.begin();res!=top->_residues.end(); ++res) {
00140         CreateResidue((*res)->getName());
00141     }
00142   
00143     // \todo beadnames in molecules!!
00144     for(mol=top->_molecules.begin();mol!=top->_molecules.end(); ++mol) {
00145         Molecule *mi = CreateMolecule((*mol)->getName());
00146         for(int i=0; i<mi->BeadCount(); i++) {
00147             mi->AddBead(mi->getBead(i), "invalid");
00148         }
00149     }
00150 }
00151 
00152 void Topology::CopyTopologyData(Topology *top)
00153 {
00154     BeadContainer::iterator it_bead;
00155     ResidueContainer::iterator it_res;
00156     MoleculeContainer::iterator it_mol;
00157     InteractionContainer::iterator it_ia;
00158 
00159     _bc->setBox(top->getBox());
00160     _time = top->_time;
00161     _step = top->_step;
00162 
00163     // cleanup old data
00164     Cleanup();
00165 
00166     // copy all residues
00167     for(it_res=top->_residues.begin();it_res!=top->_residues.end(); ++it_res) {
00168         CreateResidue((*it_res)->getName());
00169     }
00170 
00171     // create all beads
00172     for(it_bead=top->_beads.begin(); it_bead!=top->_beads.end(); ++it_bead) {
00173         Bead *bi = *it_bead;
00174         BeadType *type =  GetOrCreateBeadType(bi->getType()->getName());
00175         Bead *bn = CreateBead(bi->getSymmetry(), bi->getName(), type, bi->getResnr(), bi->getM(), bi->getQ());
00176         bn->setOptions(bi->Options());
00177     }
00178 
00179     // copy all molecules
00180     for(it_mol=top->_molecules.begin();it_mol!=top->_molecules.end(); ++it_mol) {
00181         Molecule *mi = CreateMolecule((*it_mol)->getName());
00182         for(int i=0; i<(*it_mol)->BeadCount(); i++) {
00183             int beadid = (*it_mol)->getBead(i)->getId();
00184             mi->AddBead(_beads[beadid], (*it_mol)->getBeadName(i));
00185         }
00186     }
00187     // TODO: copy interactions
00188     //for(it_ia=top->_interaction.begin();it_ia=top->_interactions.end();++it_ia) {
00189 
00190     //}
00191 }

00194 void Topology::RenameMolecules(string range, string name)
00195 {
00196     RangeParser rp;
00197     RangeParser::iterator i;
00198     
00199     rp.Parse(range);
00200     for(i=rp.begin();i!=rp.end();++i) {
00201         if((unsigned int)*i > _molecules.size())
00202             throw runtime_error(string("RenameMolecules: num molecules smaller than"));
00203         getMolecule(*i-1)->setName(name);
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 void Topology::CheckMoleculeNaming(void)
00208 {
00209     map<string,int> nbeads;
00210 
00211     for(MoleculeContainer::iterator iter = _molecules.begin(); iter!=_molecules.end(); ++iter) {
00212         map<string,int>::iterator entry = nbeads.find((*iter)->getName());
00213         if(entry != nbeads.end()) {
00214             if(entry->second != (*iter)->BeadCount())
00215                 throw runtime_error("There are molecules which have the same name but different number of bead "
00216                         "please check the section manual topology handling in the votca manual");
00217             continue;
00218         }
00219         nbeads[(*iter)->getName()] = (*iter)->BeadCount();
00220     }
00221 }

00224 void Topology::AddBondedInteraction(Interaction *ic)
00225 {
00226     map<string,int>::iterator iter;
00227     iter = _interaction_groups.find(ic->getGroup());
00228     if(iter!=_interaction_groups.end())
00229         ic->setGroupId((*iter).second);
00230     else {
00231         int i= _interaction_groups.size();
00232         _interaction_groups[ic->getGroup()] = i;
00233         ic->setGroupId(i);
00234     }
00235     _interactions.push_back(ic);
00236     _interactions_by_group[ic->getGroup()].push_back(ic);
00237 }
00238 
00239 std::list<Interaction *> Topology::InteractionsInGroup(const string &group)
00240 {
00241     map<string, list<Interaction*> >::iterator iter;
00242     iter = _interactions_by_group.find(group);
00243     if(iter == _interactions_by_group.end())
00244         return list<Interaction *>();
00245     return iter->second;
00246 }

00248 
00249 BeadType *Topology::GetOrCreateBeadType(string name)
00250 {
00251     map<string, int>::iterator iter;
00252     
00253     iter = _beadtype_map.find(name);
00254     if(iter == _beadtype_map.end()) {
00255         BeadType *bt = new BeadType(this, _beadtypes.size(), name);
00256         _beadtypes.push_back(bt);
00257         _beadtype_map[name] = bt->getId();
00258         return bt;
00259     }
00260     else {
00261         return _beadtypes[(*iter).second];
00262     }
00263     return NULL;
00264 }

00266 vec Topology::BCShortestConnection(const vec &r_i, const vec &r_j) const
00267 {
00268     return _bc->BCShortestConnection(r_i, r_j);
00269 }
00270 
00271 vec Topology::getDist(int bead1, int bead2) const
00272 {
00273     return BCShortestConnection(
00274             getBead(bead1)->getPos(),
00275             getBead(bead2)->getPos());
00276 }

00279 {
00280     return _bc->BoxVolume();
00281 }

00283 void Topology::RebuildExclusions()
00284 {
00285     _exclusions.CreateExclusions(this);
00286 }
00287 
00288 BoundaryCondition::eBoxtype Topology::autoDetectBoxType(const matrix &box) {
00289     // set the box type to OpenBox in case "box" is the zero matrix,
00290     // to OrthorhombicBox in case "box" is a diagonal matrix,
00291     // or to TriclinicBox otherwise
00292     if(box.get(0,0)==0 && box.get(0,1)==0 && box.get(0,2)==0 &&
00293        box.get(1,0)==0 && box.get(1,1)==0 && box.get(1,2)==0 &&
00294        box.get(2,0)==0 && box.get(2,1)==0 && box.get(2,2)==0) {
00295         //cout << "box open\n";
00296         return BoundaryCondition::typeOpen;
00297     }
00298     else
00299     if(box.get(0,1)==0 && box.get(0,2)==0 &&
00300        box.get(1,0)==0 && box.get(1,2)==0 &&
00301        box.get(2,0)==0 && box.get(2,1)==0) {
00302         //cout << "box orth\n";
00303         return BoundaryCondition::typeOrthorhombic;
00304     }
00305     else {
00306         //cout << "box tric\n";
00307         return BoundaryCondition::typeTriclinic;
00308     }
00309     return BoundaryCondition::typeOpen;
00310 }
00311 
00312 double Topology::ShortestBoxSize()
00313 {
00314     vec _box_a = getBox().getCol(0);
00315     vec _box_b = getBox().getCol(1);
00316     vec _box_c = getBox().getCol(2);
00317 
00318     // create plane normals
00319     vec _norm_a = _box_b ^ _box_c;
00320     vec _norm_b = _box_c ^ _box_a;
00321     vec _norm_c = _box_a ^ _box_b;
00322 
00323     _norm_a.normalize();
00324     _norm_b.normalize();
00325     _norm_c.normalize();
00326 
00327     double la = _box_a * _norm_a;
00328     double lb = _box_b * _norm_b;
00329     double lc = _box_c * _norm_c;
00330 
00331     return min(la, min(lb, lc));
00332 }
